entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 6.
